item.description: We’ll walk on the Boardwalk along the ocean’s edge and listen to the waves. Join us for a Sunday morning walk and then on to lunch at a local restaurant. For info, call Gail 860-434-6426 or 860-582-8229. Directions: Rt. 9S to I-95N, take Exit 72 (Rocky Neck), at ramp end bear left onto West Main Street (Rt. 156), continue 2.7 miles, turn right onto Baptist Lane (before RR tracts), we’ll meet in parking lot.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be in parking lot waiting for you.

group.who: Come join us for a FUN time!
group.name: Singles Social Connections

item.name: Singles Walk & Lunch
